sourcesContent:
import "./f.css" export default function F12() { return (

If you’re wrong admit it

  • If you’re wrong admit it quickly and empathetically
  • Instead of breaking lances with him, I admitted that he was absolutely right and I was absolutely wrong. I admitted that quickly openly and with enthusiasm
  • The affair terminated graciously in him taking my side and me taking his side.
  • Any fool can defend his mistakes and most fools do but it raises one above the herd and gives one the feeling of nobility to admit one’s mistake
  • When we are right let’s try to admit people gently and tactfully to our way of thinking
  • And when we are wrong let’s admit our mistakes quickly and with enthusiasm
  • By fighting you never get enough but by yielding you get more than you expected
) }
